title: Former pastor charged with murdering of girl, 8, nearly 50 years ago
description: A former pastor has been charged in the US with the abduction and murder of an eight-year-old girl nearly half a century ago.

title: Protests rock Indian parliament for third day after ethnic violence in Manipur
description: Protests have rocked the Indian parliament for a third consecutive day over  ethnic clashes in the northeastern state of Manipur.

title: Deadly US southwest heatwave will expand to cover much of America
description: A deadly heatwave simmering in the US southwest since spring is expected to spread to several other states, with multiple heat warnings being issued.

title: 'It has been really traumatic': Tourists and villagers join exodus as wildfires tear across Rhodes
description: In the Greek village of Massari, on the east coast of Rhodes, they're clearing out.

title: PSG accept world record £259m bid from Saudi club for footballer Kylian Mbappe
description: Paris Saint-Germain have accepted Al Hilal's world record bid of £259m to sign Kylian Mbappe.

title: Protests in Israel as controversial change to judges' power is approved
description: Israel's parliament has signed off a key part of Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's controversial plan to reshape the justice system.

title: Eleven killed after school gym roof collapses on girls' volleyball team
description: Eleven people were killed when a school gym's roof collapsed in China, authorities have said, with many victims believed to be young female volleyball players.

title: Stars pay tribute to singer, actress and style icon Jane Birkin at her funeral
description: Singer Vanessa Paradis and the French president's wife, Brigitte Macron, were among the famous faces who paid tribute to singer and actress Jane Birkin at her funeral in Paris on Monday.

title: Saudi team make world record £259m bid for PSG striker Kylian Mbappe
description: Saudi football club Al Hilal have made a world record £259m bid for Paris Saint-Germain striker Kylian Mbappe.

title: Greta Thunberg fined for disobeying police order at protest
description: Greta Thunberg has been fined after being charged with disobeying police at a protest in southern Sweden.

title: British tourist escapes 'scene from Dante's inferno' as helicopter dowses path through Rhodes wildfire
description: A British tourist has told how he escaped a "scene from Dante's Inferno" thanks to a helicopter dowsing a path through a wildfire.

title: Women's World Cup 2023: Germany v Morocco - follow live
Plane crashes into roof of home
description: A small plane has crashed into the roof of a home in Texas, US authorities said.

title: Woman found dead after suspected grizzly bear attack
description: A woman has been found dead after a suspected grizzly bear attack in the US.

title: Novak Djokovic pulls out of Canadian tournament due to fatigue
description: Novak Djokovic has withdrawn from the National Bank Open in Toronto due to fatigue, Tennis Canada has announced.
